str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.
Properly, to distinguish, i.e. Decide; by implication, to try, condemn, punish.

str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

A tunic, garment, undergarment. Of foreign origin; a tunic or shirt.

str2: From apo and hiemi; to send forth, in various applications.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A long flowing outer garment, tunic. Neuter of a presumed derivative of ennumi; a dress.
